content: this festive colorwork hat showcases a fun skull motif ideal for celebrating halloween the design features vibrant skulls in white against a deep black background creating a striking and playful look perfect for keeping warm while adding a spooky flair to your autumn wardrobe finished measurements 21 /52cm head circumference the hat will stretch comfortably to fit a 24 /61cm head yarn cascade 220 superwash was used for the sample any worsted weight yarn in a main color and 2 contrast colors yardage mc - 200 yards / 183 meters cc1 - 30 yards / 27 meters cc2 - 40 yards / 37 meters needles us 4 / 3 5mm for ribbing us 6 / 4mm for stockinette 16 /40cm circular needle for working in the round and double pointed needles for working crown notions stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 22 stitches and 28 rounds in 4 /10cm in stockinette worked in the round
